the first time as a Piston, Allen Iverson scored 17 points and led Detroit to a 107-97 victory over the slumping Milwaukee Bucks.`` With everything going on, I wanted to play well,'' Allen Iverson said. I just wanted to play well. Especially for my teammates because I let them down by not being here. Allen Iverson was benched by Pistons coach Andrew Bogut Curry to begin the game, punishment for missing a mandatory team practice on Thanksgiving.
